hero.title: Create your own intelligent chatbot
hero.subtitle: No Coding experience, Quick start!
hero.description: Our platform makes it easy to build and manage chatbots, supporting a wide range of application scenarios, whether it's customer service, autoresponders, e-commerce, our platform has you covered!

signPage.forgotPasswordHint: Enter your email address and we will send you a password reset letter.
signPage.notHaveAccount: Don't have an account? Sign Up
signPage.haveAccount: Already have an account? Sign In

notFoundPage.title: Page Not Found
notFoundPage.description: Oops! The page you are looking for doesn't exist. It might have been moved or deleted, or you may have typed the URL incorrectly.

feature.faqDescription: The FAQ module incorporates AI's RAG (Retrieval Augmented Generation) system, which is able to retrieve relevant answers from the database in real-time and provide accurate and natural responses through generative techniques. Whether it's a frequently asked question or specialized knowledge, this module handles it with ease and ensures that users receive satisfactory answers.
feature.ecommDescription: The e-commerce module helps you track customer behavior, predict sales trends, and automatically generate customer feedback reports through AI data analytics, while merchants can effectively manage inventory, increase conversion rates, and provide a personalized shopping experience.
feature.reservationDescription: The Reservation Module makes it easy to manage all kinds of bookings and arrangements. From the customer's point of view, the booking process is simple and fast, and the support of notification function ensures that you will not miss any important appointments.

error.email_format: Incorrect email format, please enter a valid email address.
error.password_mismatch: Passwords do not match, please enter the same password.
error.user_already_exists: User already exists, please register with a different email.
error.user_not_found: User not found, please sign up.
error.unknown_error: An unexpected error occurred, please check your operation and try again.
